title: 【临时工搬运】HMS暴乱| 5级护卫舰.HMS Tempestuous | 5th Rate Frigate
author: 筒子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 __Tong__ 于 2015-4-15 18:00 编辑 

HMS Tempestuous | 5th Rate Frigate
HMS暴乱| 5级护卫舰
[paper]作者原话[paper]As the title says this is the german battleship H39. It's mostly known by this name because it was never finished and therefor never received a real name. The ship would have been 277.8 meters long which would have made it the longest battleship ever built. 

With a displacement of 63,600 tons (full load) it would have also been the second heaviest class of battleships ever built. The beam is 37 meters and it has a draft of 11 meters.(also full load) 

This ship was quite hard to build since there aren't any historical photos of it and also not many 3D models. 
I still tried to make the best out of the pictures I had and hope you guys like it.
为了尊重作者，我还是不机翻了，毕竟这个只是作者的一些话而已，没有什么重要的内容下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因
[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个作者对于战舰有特殊的爱好啊，看到他的个人作品里面都是战舰战舰的，而且做得特别的帅我觉得战争类的服务器加几个这种战舰简直是如虎添翼[painting]图片欣赏[painting]
[powered_minecart]Schematics存档安装方法[powered_minecart]Schematics存档：这类型需要MCEdit。下载完成后解压到桌面，关闭Minecraft，双击mcedit.exe，点下方import按钮，打开你下载的文件到你需要放的地方，最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。
[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*

更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
